section.title: Backup and Recovery
section.para: Typical tasks of the Monitoring Service operator are to make regular backups, particularly of the data created during operation.
At regular intervals, you should make a backup of all:

listitem.para: Configuration files of the individual agents and services.
Monitoring and log dashboards you have created and saved.

section.para: CMM does not offer integrated backup and recovery mechanisms. Instead, you use the mechanisms and procedures of the individual components.
